pages.text: Baroi [siposguzorī az] hamʙastagī va unsi Qurajş
[Hamon] Hamʙastagī va unsi onon dar safarhoi zimistonī [ʙa Jaman] va toʙistonī [ʙa Şom]
Hamon [Parvardigore], ki ononro az gurusnagī [rahonid, ʙa eşon] xūrok dod va az vahşatu tars emin namud
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo kase, ki rūzi çazoro durūƣ meangorad, didaī
Pas ū [hamon] kasest, ki jatimro [ʙo duruştī az xud] meronad
Va [digaronro] ʙa it'omi tihidast taşviq namekunad
Hamon kasone, ki az namozaşon ƣofiland
Va [az amonat dodani] vasoili zarurii zindagī dareƣ mevarzand
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ba rostī, ki Mo ʙa tu xajri ʙenihojat ato kardem
Pas, ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va qurʙonī kun
Be tardid, duşmanat [az hamai xajrotu ʙarakot ʙeʙahra va] ʙurida ast
